com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.log.util

Class AbstractMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.log.util.AbstractMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Message
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KCVSMessage

    public abstract class AbstractMessage
extends Object
implements Message
    Abstract implementation of Message which exposes the timestamp, sender, and payload of a message. Particular Log implementations can extend this class.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
